ranked.unauthenticated: You need to be logged in to access this page
ranked.error: Error occurred. Please try again later.

review.onlyModerators: Only moderator can review, approve, reject reports!

reportReason.badRandom: No aim, no skill, no coordination
reportReason.griefPlay: Standing still, not attacking, team sabotage or giving up
reportReason.cheating: Using hacks, bots, exploits, or takedown trading

ranked.errorApprove: An error occurred while approving the report.
